text.div:
COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Cardiac Pacemaker Procedure

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    1279006 Repair of cardiac pacemaker pocket in skin AND/OR subcutaneous tissue (procedure)
    13756000 Check artificial pacemaker for electrode impedance (procedure)
